prompts: Build a clothing e-commerce website backend.

Build a clothing e-commerce website backend. using Web Development.
Current step: Choose Web Development.
From the following options,you *must* recommend only one if there is a clearly best choice for the current task. If there isn’t a single best option, *then only* give me more options.
Options: Frontend, Backend, Deployment & Hosting.

Build a clothing e-commerce website backend. using Web Development + Backend.
Current step: Choose Backend.
From the following options,you *must* recommend only one if there is a clearly best choice for the current task. If there isn’t a single best option, *then only* give me more options.
Options: REST, GraphQL, gRPC, WebSockets, Server-Sent Events (SSE), WebRTC.

Build a clothing e-commerce website backend. using Web Development + Deployment & Hosting.
Current step: Choose Deployment & Hosting.
From the following options,you *must* recommend only one if there is a clearly best choice for the current task. If there isn’t a single best option, *then only* give me more options.
Options: Static & Frontend, Platform as a Service (PaaS).

Build a clothing e-commerce website backend. using Web Development + Backend + REST.
Current step: Choose REST.
From the following options,you *must* recommend only one if there is a clearly best choice for the current task. If there isn’t a single best option, *then only* give me more options.
Options: JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, Java, PHP, Go, C#, Ruby, Rust, Elixir, Kotlin, Scala, Dart, Haskell, Crystal, Lua, R, C/C++.

Build a clothing e-commerce website backend. using Web Development + Backend + GraphQL.
Current step: Choose GraphQL.
From the following options,you *must* recommend only one if there is a clearly best choice for the current task. If there isn’t a single best option, *then only* give me more options.
Options: JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, Java, Kotlin, Scala, Ruby, Go.

Build a clothing e-commerce website backend. using Web Development + Deployment & Hosting + Static & Frontend.
Current step: Choose Static & Frontend.
From the following options,you *must* recommend only one if there is a clearly best choice for the current task. If there isn’t a single best option, *then only* give me more options.
Options: Vercel, Netlify, GitHub Pages, Cloudflare Pages, AWS Amplify.

Build a clothing e-commerce website backend. using Web Development + Backend + REST + JavaScript/TypeScript.
Current step: Choose JavaScript/TypeScript.
From the following options,you *must* recommend only one if there is a clearly best choice for the current task. If there isn’t a single best option, *then only* give me more options.
Options: Express.js, NestJS, Fastify, Koa.js, Hapi.js, AdonisJS.

Build a clothing e-commerce website backend. using Web Development + Backend + REST + Python.
Current step: Choose Python.
From the following options,you *must* recommend only one if there is a clearly best choice for the current task. If there isn’t a single best option, *then only* give me more options.
Options: Django, Flask, FastAPI, Sanic, Tornado.

Build a clothing e-commerce website backend. using Web Development + Backend + REST + JavaScript/TypeScript + Express.js.
Current step: Choose Express.js.
From the following options,you *must* recommend only one if there is a clearly best choice for the current task. If there isn’t a single best option, *then only* give me more options.
Options: NGINX, Apache HTTP Server, Caddy, PM2.

Build a clothing e-commerce website backend. using Web Development + Backend + REST + JavaScript/TypeScript + NestJS.
Current step: Choose NestJS.
From the following options,you *must* recommend only one if there is a clearly best choice for the current task. If there isn’t a single best option, *then only* give me more options.
Options: NGINX, Apache HTTP Server, Caddy, PM2.

Build a clothing e-commerce website backend. using Web Development + Backend + REST + Python + Django.
Current step: Choose Django.
From the following options,you *must* recommend only one if there is a clearly best choice for the current task. If there isn’t a single best option, *then only* give me more options.
Options: Gunicorn, NGINX, Apache HTTP Server, Caddy.

Build a clothing e-commerce website backend. using Web Development + Backend + REST + Python + Flask.
Current step: Choose Flask.
From the following options,you *must* recommend only one if there is a clearly best choice for the current task. If there isn’t a single best option, *then only* give me more options.
Options: Gunicorn, NGINX, Apache HTTP Server, Caddy.

Build a clothing e-commerce website backend. using Web Development + Backend + REST + JavaScript/TypeScript + Express.js + Apache HTTP Server.
Current step: Choose Apache HTTP Server.
From the following options,you *must* recommend only one if there is a clearly best choice for the current task. If there isn’t a single best option, *then only* give me more options.
